Name: Rice Seed
Notes: This should provide enough seed for 1 Hectare of land

Name: Rice
Notes: This should feed 125 people for 1 day

Name: First Aid Kit
Notes: This should provide basic first aid (bandages, oral rehydration salts, etc) for 100 people to self-administer

Name: Medical Kit
Notes: This should provide medical supplies (medicines, vaccines) for a professional clinic to provide assistance to a total community of 10,000 people.

Name: Shelter Kit
Notes: This kit is suitable to provide emergency repair to a damaged home. It contains a tarpaulin, zinc sheet, wooden poles, hammer & nails

Name: Tent
Notes: This should house a family of up to 8 people

Name: Hygiene Kit
Notes: Personal Hygiene supplies for 100 Households (5 persons/household): Each get 2x Buckets, 10x Soap, Cotton cloth

Name: Water Purification Sachets
Notes: Designed to provide a 1st phase drinking water purification solution at the household level. Contains 600 sachets to provide sufficient drinking water (4l) for 100 people for 30 days.
